tasks.code:
import pandas as pd

# Create a DataFrame with a 'date' column
df = pd.DataFrame({'date': ['2023-03-08', '2023-03-09', '2023-03-10']})

# Convert the 'date' column to datetime
df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])

# Check the data type of the 'date' column
print(df['date'].dtype)
